# Tools

| Tool / App                                                                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                            | Contributor                                                                                                |
|--------------------|--------------------------------|--------------------|
| [Easy Report](https://npscoresheet-b0f9fbefac84.herokuapp.com)                                             | Say goodbye to data cleaning and manual Excel tasks. **Easy Report** transforms reporting into a seamless, efficient process, allowing you to focus on delivering valuable insights.   | [Alexandra Davis](#alexneuropsych)                                                                         |
| [Reliable Change Calculators](https://www.navneuro.com/132/)                                               | A series of Excel sheets for easily calculating reliable change scores using manual entry of pre-populated for the RBANS                                                               | Kevin Duff                                                                                                 |
| [Calculators for Neuropsychology Practice](https://homepages.abdn.ac.uk/j.crawford/pages/dept/psychom.htm) | A huge range of downloadable (Windows) calculators for neuropsychology practice (e.g., regression, percentiles, single case-analysis, reliable change, supplementary test output etc.) | [John Crawford](https://homepages.abdn.ac.uk/j.crawford/pages/dept/index.html) and a series of co-authors. |
